r.d: Igbinary is a drop in replacement for the standard php serializer. Instead of time and space consuming textual representation, igbinary stores php data structures in a compact binary form. Savings are significant when using memcached or similar memory based storages for serialized data.
r.n: * Fix build for php 8.1 after changes to enum internals. * Update tests to suppress deprecations in php 8.1 and support run-tests.php changes in php 8.1 * Don't emit a notice when unserialize_callback_func causes igbinary_unserialize to throw https://bugs.php.net/bug.php?id=81118
